sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Remove redundant wizard answers for child tables that extend sys_mass_encryption_job</description>
        <name>Remove extra wizards for encryption jobs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var SECRETS_MANAGEMENT_JOB_WIZARD_ANSWER_ID = '472869c753d031106cdbddeeff7b1292';
var SIGNING_JOB_WIZARD_ANSWER_ID = '87e77ef949063110ce41c8d4b027c95d';
var SYS_WIZARD_ANSWER = 'sys_wizard_answer';
var NAME = 'name';
var ANSWER = 'answer';
var SECRETS_MANAGEMENT_JOB = 'Secrets Management Job';
var SIGNING_JOB = 'Signing Job';
var DOES_NOT_EQUAL = '!=';
var SYS_ID = 'sys_id';

// delete redundant secrets management job wizard
var gr0 = new GlideRecord(SYS_WIZARD_ANSWER);
gr0.addQuery(NAME, SECRETS_MANAGEMENT_JOB);
gr0.addQuery(ANSWER, SECRETS_MANAGEMENT_JOB);
gr0.addQuery(SYS_ID, DOES_NOT_EQUAL, SECRETS_MANAGEMENT_JOB_WIZARD_ANSWER_ID);
gr0.query();
while (gr0.next()) {
    gr0.deleteRecord();
}

// delete redundant signing job wizard
var gr1 = new GlideRecord(SYS_WIZARD_ANSWER);
gr1.addQuery(NAME, SIGNING_JOB);
gr1.addQuery(ANSWER, SIGNING_JOB);
gr1.addQuery(SYS_ID, DOES_NOT_EQUAL, SIGNING_JOB_WIZARD_ANSWER_ID);
gr1.query();
while (gr1.next()) {
    gr1.deleteRecord();
}
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-11-28 00:24:04</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3e53109d77b231108287cffbae5a991b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove extra wizards for encryption jobs</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Encryption Core" source="com.glide.encryption.core">f973f8e03c31311068bcf327dfe37f6e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3e53109d77b231108287cffbae5a991b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-28 21:30:42</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Remove extra wizards for encryption jobs
